website_summaries.verdict: A single-speed or fixie bike designed with the urban commute in mind.
pros: For the price, this is a great fixie bike that is simple to use and rides well
Available in three sizes and six colors
The welded steel frame weighs about 22 pounds, depending on the size
cons: Assembly is difficult and best done by a bike shop

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble and great ride in the city
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase I love my new bike, super easy to assemble, great ride, handles Chicago potholes, lighter then expected, and the colors look great. I do hate the lime green rubbery grips so I got new ones. I only had to assemble the pedals, handle bars, front wheel, and seat. After that you adjust the breaks and double check everything. It came with 2 reflectors but no tools so have your screw driver, wrench, and Allen wrench set ready. So far so good I'll update this if I have any trouble.
customer_reviews.author: peanut753

customer_reviews.title: It’s pretty but very delicate
customer_reviews.text: the bicycle does not weigh, it's pretty, arrived at the scheduled time, but I only use it one hour a day from Tuesday to Thursday and for a month has a noise in the part of the pedals that has been getting worse
customer_reviews.author: jairo

customer_reviews.title: good bike for money
customer_reviews.text: bought the bike to commute around work campus. quality as to be expected for the price. nothing special but does what its supposed to do
customer_reviews.author: Brian B.

customer_reviews.title: My husband love this bike
customer_reviews.text: My husband love this bike. Hes very happy with it. Got him medium size and he is abt 240 lbs he enjoys riding five stars. Awsome bike.
customer_reviews.author: Sage R No E

customer_reviews.title: Great bike for commuting and fairly solid
customer_reviews.text: Great bike for commuting and fairly solid. It does tend to need slightly more maintenance than other bikes I have had in the past but no real complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Kiran Vajapey

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bike for the price. I like be the fixed speed instead of having different gears. Everyone loves the color scheme.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's okay. I just wish the tires would last longer
customer_reviews.text: The tires on the bike didn't seem to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Paczuski

customer_reviews.title: After six months still happy with the bike
customer_reviews.text: After six months still happy with the bike, shipped fast and excellent quality, just wish it had a kickstand . . .
customer_reviews.author: peter

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Almost a 5. The brakes are loose. Everything else is great
customer_reviews.author: dj jacobsen

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: So the bike is great with some add ons. I changed the seat it is horrible! I call it the ass destroyer. The frame us super light a absolutely beautiful, so are the tires. The brakes are ok but you gotta change them after a month of riding hard or you'll end up getting hurt. I ride 15 miles a day on it and ive enjoyed every moment of it. The tires are pretty good haven't got a flat yet. I added a flash light a bell and blinkers to the back everywhere i go ppl complement me on the bike, it really is beautiful. The price is perfect and you get a good bike.
customer_reviews.author: jovani mercado

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Came on time, bike was just as expected. Slight adjustments needed, but that's with any new bike. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Williams

customer_reviews.title: Not worth a Dollar!
customer_reviews.text: Very bad quality. Tires always pop even after getting the spokes adjusted.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: super satisfied with the quality of this ensemble.. love it, and my son does too.
customer_reviews.author: carmen mendoza

customer_reviews.title: it is a very nice looking bicycle
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the green rims on the tires had a few scratches on it, and one of the scratches is particularly long and deep (very noticeable). Also the brakes were very misaligned and would require taking them to a bike shop. Overall, it is a very nice looking bicycle. I love the colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, simple
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly. My grandson is enthralled. Lightweight, sturdy, simple. Might need to replace inner tubes.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Strong

customer_reviews.title: bike is ok for the price i guess ,i wouldn't recommend, unless you want cheap parts
customer_reviews.text: Average bike for the cost , the rims were spray painted green and the first day of riding the paint started coming off when the brakes hit the rims.Kinda ghetto paint job and the bike came with the wrong screws for the reflectors .I was gonna buy the same style of bike for my go's birthday but i think i'll shop around for something else .
customer_reviews.author: keola sakima

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bike. I love it. Easy to put together. Make sure all the screws are tightened properly. Also take care of it if you want it to last. Great for going a to b. Not a racing track type bike. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: haris kacic

customer_reviews.title: high hopes, but junk
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bike and constructed it with a professional bike mechanic. All seemed well for the first week until I noticed a problem with the pedals; the crankarm had come loose from the crankshaft due to crappy threading. The pedal now hangs loose off the crankshaft and the bike is sadly useless. I am awaiting response from the seller to rectify this. Hopefully I will be able to edit this review afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: average_guy

customer_reviews.title: fast shipping and everything was right. but do get ...
customer_reviews.text: fast shipping and everything was right. but do get some grease cause the bike doesnt come with nearly the amount needed.
customer_reviews.author: matthew white

customer_reviews.title: Not a happy customer yet ...
customer_reviews.text: Just assembled the bike, which was not that difficult. But I had difficulty in inflating the rear tire. But after some a few attempts, I was able to pump air. But soon after inflating, I noticed that the tires were bulging and slipping out of the rim. I need to call the support and find out what's going on.
customer_reviews.author: S . Jawahar

customer_reviews.title: very nice bike for the price
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old son loves this bike and I think it's pretty cool as well. Clean and simple, well built.
customer_reviews.author: Gui Sabate

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great bike. shipped quick. been riding it for a few months now and no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel E Habib

customer_reviews.title: Modern sleek
customer_reviews.text: This bike has gotten many compliments just on style alone, but the ride surpasses the style. its smooth comfort ride makes for a perfect workout with no struggle. This bike makes you want to have fun!
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda

customer_reviews.title: Accidental vengeance tool.
customer_reviews.text: True story: this frame was welded incorrectly and I ended up giving it to a bike store for disposal. One of the guys there took it home, fixed it up, took it for a ride, and the frame literally fell apart underneath him. He was in a crazy cast for months. So that's a lesson learned. Upside: I never liked that guy anyway.
customer_reviews.author: mosbey

customer_reviews.title: No kick stand included
customer_reviews.text: I guess the bike is okay. I bought it for my daughter and had a bike shop put it together, but was very annoyed that he did not come with a kick stand.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Williamson

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Where is my refund , this bike did not work
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: the delivery was fast and the seller service is really great! I recommend
customer_reviews.text: The bycicle is lovely, the delivery was fast and the seller service is really great! I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Fernanda Benedetti

customer_reviews.title: Good price, good bike
customer_reviews.text: Vary good bike for the price, though I did crash and my forks bent vary bad. So the forks are vary week. Overall a good bike for the money
customer_reviews.author: Alian Virador

customer_reviews.title: Horrible bike
customer_reviews.text: This bike came looking good, but looks obviously didn't matter in this case. First of all, the tire wouldn't slide into place because the measurements were off so I had to pay for service to fix that. Then when I rode it to school for the first time, pieces were falling out and the whole handlebar system fell off. The brakes also didn't work after and I was late to school. I demand something in return from this company, as I could've seriously injured myself. This bike is very unsafe and a horrible fixie.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged package
customer_reviews.text: I'm disappointed because the package was damaged and the bike has dent, paint scratched. That is the reason for 3 stars. It was a gift for my grandson, he likes the bike. Hated giving him a damaged bike. He didn't want to wait if we returned it, needed it for school.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Bike looks good but within just a few days/week the pedals started ...
customer_reviews.text: Bike looks good but within just a few days/week the pedals started making noise and had to be taken to the shop to be fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's speedy and looks very cool.
customer_reviews.text: I'm loving this bike so far. The only complaint that I have is that the paint on the frame came a little chipped and that the front brakes are making the finish on the rims of the wheels come off. It's speedy and looks very cool.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee N.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bike for the price, I love the color scheme of the bike, people stop and ask me what type of bike it is and how much it cost frequently. i did have to replace the tires a few months after using due to the high volume of flats i was getting but that's the only issue I've had
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you tighten all the screws on the bike ...
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you tighten all the screws on the bike. bring it to the shop before you ride it and have it tuned, VERY IMPORTANT
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike.
customer_reviews.text: I received my bike and when I opened the box I was super happy with the colors. Very well built bike and it was easy to put together. Although I did take it to a bike shop to get everything tightened up. Since then I ride everyday and have had no problems. I have even told my friends about this bike. Would buy this bike again.
customer_reviews.author: james mcneil

customer_reviews.title: this is a great bike. A good 14 year old grow out ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a great bike. A good 14 year old grow out of, can take anywhere kind of bike.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bike for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great bike for the price. You can't beat this deal. I bought this bike due to the fact that I wanted to try out fixed gear and immediately enjoyed it. Now I can't stop customizing it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Villalobos

customer_reviews.title: Great bikes. Ordered one for my girlfriend and best ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bikes. Ordered one for my girlfriend and best friend, and these bikes have started our fixed gear love. We ride almost every day and night now and these bikes have held up so far.
customer_reviews.author: Elijah

customer_reviews.title: this bike is awesome right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: The components could all use some upgrading but for the price, this bike is awesome right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Zink

customer_reviews.title: Fun Bike
customer_reviews.text: The bike came in one box, everything included. I love that it has a flip flop hub. I immediately changed mine so it is straight fixie. Will definitely be buying some new pedals though. Overall really good starter fixie
customer_reviews.author: ryan dugan

customer_reviews.title: Great bike!
customer_reviews.text: Great bike! Runs really smooth. Couldn't be happier with my purchase. I ride my bike through out NYC. I have only changed the brakes and added bullhorns, other than that, everything is great!
customer_reviews.author: Leonardocorona

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike, but !
customer_reviews.text: i spend 30$ to fix both wheel because of 8 but still 222$ bike !! i'm happy with it !
customer_reviews.author: Someone from behind

customer_reviews.title: Love for a bike
customer_reviews.text: The bike is amazing. Crossing the Cities in under an hour. Couldn't love it more
customer_reviews.author: Brad Swift

customer_reviews.title: Deal for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Good deal for a quality product, at a fair price. Came on time with no problems, easy to assemble and ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: The quality and colors of the bike were excellent, and the price was very reasonable. The staff was very professional,friendly and quick to respond to our questions. We were very satisfied all the way around.
customer_reviews.author: JoJo

customer_reviews.title: great frame, good fixie for the money
customer_reviews.text: cheap price for decent fixed gear bike, tubes and tires aren't the best, but cheap to resolve small problem that's my personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: Greg  Wozniak

customer_reviews.title: Bike came in quickly and looks great. Easy to assemble and the quality seems to ...
customer_reviews.text: Bike came in quickly and looks great. Easy to assemble and the quality seems to be pretty solid for such a low price point.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: pretty well
customer_reviews.text: My product is perfect, I like it but there is a lot of extra paiment like manutation and douane not written on purchase. the bike is really nice
customer_reviews.author: Benoit Bureau

product_meta.title: Vilano Rampage Fixed Gear Fixie Single Speed Road Bike
product_meta.description:
The all new Vilano Rampage is a stylish urban fixed gear bike. It features 45mm Deep-V Anodized wheels with matching anodized hubs. The rear hub is flip-flop with a freewheel and cog, this allows you to quickly change from single speed to fixed gear by simply flipping the rear wheel. The urban geometry frame ans straight fork are tig-welded high tensile steel. We've also included 28c tires for increased contact and control in urban settings. Lt;strong>Features:&let;/strong>
Fixed gear or single speed (flip-flop hub)Urban geometry 700c tig-welded Frame and Fork Forged Alloy Crank set w/46T replaceable chain ring45mm Double Walled Deep-V Anodized Wheel set with matching Anodized Hubs Free Platform Pedals IncludedFull Specifications:&let;/strong>
Rims: 45mm Deep-V profile Anodized Tires: 700c x 28c Brakes: Alloy Caliper Front & RearPedals: Free Platform Pedals&let;/p>.
feature_bullets: Fixed gear or single speed (flip-flop hub)
Urban geometry 700c tig-welded Frame and Fork
Forged Alloy Crank set w/46T replaceable chain ring
45mm Double Walled Deep-V Anodized Wheel set with matching Anodized Hubs
